The Countdown Continues! #3 Reason why I love #CityHallSelfie Day: It connects me with amazing #localgov employees from across the country and leads to learning opportunities, idea sharing and hopefully meeting @ELGL50 #ELGL22 https://t.co/UQBMJgxZIE

Reason #4 why I love #CityHallSelfie day: It celebrates the diversity of #localgov employees showing who we are, what we value, and how proud we are to serve our communities from every corner of the country! https://t.co/qPdyWfnsGh
